message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.MA 

This paper deals with a multi-armed bandit problem with combinatorial and multi-objective aspects, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves optimization and decision-making, which are related to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory). Finally, the paper discusses a resource-allocation application, which is relevant to cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems).
